main.presentation:
WELCOME TO MY PORTFOLIO !

 Thanks to several years of enriching experience, I have managed to develop this portfolio.

 Here, you will find my accomplishments as well as the steps I have gone through that have been beneficial to my professional career.

cards.groupomania: Piiquante is a chili-based condiment brand that had entrusted me with the task of development.
cards.piiquante: Piiquante est une marque de condiment à base de piment qui m'avait confié comme mission de développer
